data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Junfeng (2017): New findings of Flagellisargus J Zhang, 2012 (Diptera, Brachycera, Archisargidae), with discussion of the placements of some controversial taxa. Deutsche Entomologische Zeitschrift 64 (2): 111-122, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.64.13550, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.64.13550
